alert.note: Alert for Kootenai, Cabinet Region; Lower Clark Fork Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 6:43PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Sanders County through 730 PM MDT... At 643 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Thompson Falls, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half-inch size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Thompson Falls and Snider. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Kootenai, Cabinet Region; Lower Clark Fork Region
